product.title: Similar Threads Advice.
product.description: Shows similar threads when user types name of new one.

templates.template:
<style type="text/css">
/* Similar Threads */
#similar_threads {
        height:0px;
        overflow:hidden;
        position:relative;
}

.similar_threads {
        clear:both;
        border:none !important;
}

.similar_threads li {
        padding:{vb:stylevar blockrow_padding};
}

ol.similar_threads li h6 {
        font-size:{vb:stylevar mid_fontSize};
}

ol.similar_threads li h6 a {
        font-weight:bold;
        color:{vb:stylevar link_color};
}

#similar_threads .optiontitle {
        display:block;
        padding-left:5px;
        font-size:13px;
        font-weight:bold;
}

.similar_threads .starter_forum {
	font-size:{vb:stylevar small_fontSize};
}

.similar_threads .titleblock {
        float:{vb:stylevar left}
}

.similar_threads .dateblock {
        float:{vb:stylevar right};
        text-align:{vb:stylevar right};
        font-size:{vb:stylevar small_fontSize}
}

.similar_threads .shade {
        font-size: {vb:stylevar small_fontSize};
}

.simthreads_clear {
        clear:both;
        height:1px;
}
</style>

{vb:rawphrase simthreads_title}
  1. {vb:raw entry.prefix_rich} {vb:raw entry.title}
    {vb:rawphrase simthreads_in_forum_x, {vb:raw entry.forumtitle}}
    {vb:rawphrase replies}: {vb:raw entry.replycount}
    {vb:rawphrase last_post}: {vb:raw entry.lastreplydate}, {vb:raw entry.lastreplytime}
  2. {vb:rawphrase simthreads_more_results}
  3. {vb:rawphrase simthreads_not_found}
    4.

<script type="text/javascript" src="clientscript/simthreads.js?v={vb:raw version}"></script> <!-- YUI Animation Library --> <script type="text/javascript" src="{vb:stylevar yuipath}/animation/animation-min.js?v={vb:raw vboptions.simpleversion}"></script>
